description: KARACHI – American credit rating agency Fitch has predicted further drop in Pakistan’s inflation rate and Interest Costs for Fiscal Year 2025. The agency predicts that inflation will remain at 12percent as the country of over 240 […]
title: Fitch sees drop in Pakistan’s inflation and interest Costs for FY25

description: Pakistani Cricket Team remains under fire over the devastating World Cup exit, and key pacer Haris Rauf becomes the latest victim of bullying by a fanatic person. description: Prices of all cars, including Toyota Corolla Altis are moving up as government jacked up a budget for the next fiscal year. The government approved withholding tax on new car purchases, and the buyers will bear the brunt of this move. Amid pressure from global lenders, the government is imposing stern measures to garner revenue. […]
title: Toyota Corolla Expected Price in Pakistan after New Taxes in Budget 2024-25

description: Pakistan is experiencing slow internet due to disruption in underwater cable amid technical glitches. title: Pakistan faces Internet Disruption on Eid days – here’s why

description: Actor and singer star Don Omar shocked everyone with his cancer diagnosis. After his diagnosis, there was an outpour of well wishes as fans extended prayers. […]
title: Fast & Furious actor Don Omar shares Cancer Battle with fans

description: Children visit to zoo is no less than a norm in Lahore as festive occasion encourages family outings and provide an opportunity for children to experience wild animals. description: KARACHI – At least twelve people including some Pakistanis have been dead while around 60 others are missing, as migrant ship sinks off Italy’s southern coast. Scores of people including some children have been rescued from a sinking wooden boat, while 10 bodies were trapped in the vessel’s lower deck. Survivors were transferred to Italian […]
title: Pakistanis among 12 dead as migrant boat sinks near Italy coast

description: ISLAMABAD – The federal government has proposed various taxes on mobile phones, including Apple iPhone in recently presented budget 2024-25, which is yet to be approved by the parliament. title: New tax rate for Apple iPhones from July 1 in Pakistan after Budget 2024-25

description: LAHORE – Massive fire erupted following an explosion on motorway, M2, near Thokar Niaz Baig entry point in Lahore on Monday night. title: Massive fire erupts on Lahore-Islamabad motorway M2 near Thokar Niaz Baig
